channel.title: EU on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in EU on Argolon Solutions

item.title: New BES limits OKed by EU!
item.description: I’ve just heard (via Joe Drumgoole’s blog) that the new BES limits annnounced last November have finally been approved by the EU. This is fantastic news. This is the official EU newsletter announcement: Notification or Registration Date: 23.05.2007 DG Responsible: Competition DG Related Procedures: N 311 / 2004 Decision on 23.08.2007: Article 4ยง3 - decision not to raise objections This presumably means that Enterprise Ireland should be processing new company certs starting five days ago and the Revenue Commissioners should be approving RICTs.
